name: NVSS
flux_or_mag_cut: S ≥ 15 mJy; |b|≥7°; plus bright-source and survey masks (see paper)
notes: x and α from Sec. 3.1; D_kin expectation reported as 0.41×10^-2 for β=1.23×10^-3.
z_notes: Shared radio z_mean=1 assumed (Protocol D-BAO v0 sensitivity scaffold).

name: RACS_low
flux_or_mag_cut: S ≥ 15 mJy; |b|≥7°; plus bright-source and survey masks (see paper)
notes: x and α from Sec. 3.2; D_kin expectation reported as 0.41×10^-2 for β=1.23×10^-3.
z_notes: Shared radio z_mean=1 assumed (Protocol D-BAO v0 sensitivity scaffold).

name: CatWISE_W1lt16p5
flux_or_mag_cut: W1 < 16.5 (≈0.078 mJy); |b|≥30°; plus Secrest et al. masks; ecliptic-latitude trend modelled
notes: x and α from Sec. 3.3; Table 1 includes ε=(9.2±0.4)×10^-4 for ecliptic-latitude trend.
z_notes: From Dam et al. 2022/2023 CatWISE quasar sample: mean z≈1.2; 99% z>0.1; 61% z>1 (selection differs slightly).

name: CatWISE_W1lt16p5
flux_or_mag_cut: Same as baseline; 66 matches to 2MRS z<0.02 removed (paper notes negligible change)
